graph.topic: Should high school make music lessons compulsory

nodes.text: music has a great power which can positively influence on human being and its psychology
many university authorities provide music lessons for their students
they live and study in a harmony with music
students, who spend a great deal of their time studying different academic subjects should have an opportunity to cope with the stress gained during school time
music can be a useful and interesting solution
if musical activity involves many participants, there will be co-operation and developed team work in the group, which is, of course, beneficial in their future life
students with a quite poor academic background can show themselves in the music
the calm atmosphere in the class might be created
music can have many mentally enhancing effects on students
In our hectic life, however, demand is not for musically orientated students, but for academically developed employees
music is the art which requires special attitude towards it
students can not obtain supposed impacts, unless they get interested in it more seriously
music and other entertaining subjects should be optional
time is the most valuable thing in life with increased pace
students are to develop their professional skills by learning occupation-related subjects, rather than playing on guitar or singing a song
in order to be a competitive worker, students must know their field in an advanced level
music can help an individual to shape its character
An integration of music into learning process bound to be successful when it is not compulsory
